description: Try our easy to follow Thai-Flavoured Chicken Drumsticks recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Chicken drumsticks,Roast,Gluten free,Tree nut free,Egg free,Sesame free,Soy free,Wheat free,Rice,Chicken,Dairy free,Peanut free
name: Thai-Flavoured Chicken Drumsticks Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Combine sweet chilli sauce, lime juice and fish sauce in a jug.
Finely chop 3cm of stalk and roots of coriander and add to the mixture. Reserve coriander sprigs in a bowl, cover and refrigerate until required.
Line a roasting pan with baking paper. Put 12 chicken drumsticks into pan in a single layer.
Pour over sauce mixture, turning to coat well. Cover loosely with foil. Roast for 25 minutes.
Put 1 cup of jasmine rice into a saucepan with 2 cups of water. Place over high heat and cook until holes start to form in rice. Reduce heat to low, cover and cook for 5 minutes.
Meanwhile, Remove foil and cook for a further 10 minutes or until drumsticks are golden and cooked through.
Remove from heat and stand for 10 minutes. Fluff rice with a fork.
Using a vegetable peeler, run along length of one lebanese cucumber forming ribbons.
Serve chicken with rice, cucumber and chilli.
